committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with regard to compliance with laws relating to equal employment opportunity in the competitive service of the Federal civil service.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that compliance with title VII of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 or any other law relating to equal employment opportunity does not require the exception of positions from the Federal competitive civil service or adjustment of standards for examination, certification, or appointment.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress with regard to compliance with laws relating to equal employment opportunity in the competitive service of the Federal civil service.
